action-translation-transfer: User right action label: the ability to translate/transfer pages
log-name-bs-translation-transfer: Name of the log type on [[Special:Log]] for translations
log-description-bs-translation-transfer: Introductory text for the translations log on [[Special:Log]]
logentry-bs-translation-transfer-transla:
Log entry text when a user translates a page.

Parameters:
*
* $1 = user name
* $2 = user gender
* $3 = source page title
* $4 = target language
bs-translation-transfer-ui-language-sele: Label for selecting the target language in the translation dialog
bs-translation-transfer-ui-transfer-work: Status message shown while a page is being transferred
bs-translation-transfer-ui-transfer-succ:
Message shown after successful transfer.

Parameters:
* $1 = source page title
* $2 = target page URL
* $3 = target page title
bs-translation-transfer-ui-transfer-fail: Error message shown when a page transfer fails
bs-translation-transfer-ui-translate-wor: Status message shown while a page is being translated
bs-translation-transfer-ui-translate-suc: Message shown when translation is completed successfully
bs-translation-transfer-ui-translate-fai: Error message shown when a page translation fails
bs-translation-transfer-ui-check-target-: Status message while verifying the target page
Message shown when the target page is successfully verified
Error message when verification of the target page fails
bs-translation-transfer-ui-transfer-prev: Tab or option label to view translated content as HTML
Tab or option label to view translated content as wikitext
bs-translation-transfer-ui-dialog-action: Button label to start the translation process
Button label to cancel and close the dialog
Button label to go back to the previous step in the dialog
Button label to save changes in the dialog
Button label to view translated content as wikitext
Button label to start translation into another language
Button label to finish the process
bs-translation-transfer-local-failed: Error message shown when local translation fails
bs-translation-transfer-local-success: Success message shown when local translation completes
bs-translation-transfer-local-layout-lab: UI label for starting local translation of a page
bs-translation-transfer-local-no-languag: Error message shown when no valid target languages are found for translation
bs-translation-transfer-local-progress: Status message shown while local content is being translated
bs-translation-transfer-outdated-transla:
Notice shown when a translation is outdated.

Parameter:
* $1 = link to the source language
bs-translation-transfer-overview-source-: Column header for the source page in translation overview
Column header for the source language in translation overview
bs-translation-transfer-overview-target-: Column header for the target page in translation overview
Column header for the target language in translation overview
bs-translation-transfer-overview-release: Column header for the transfer date in translation overview
bs-translation-transfer-overview-source-: Column header for the source page last change date
bs-translation-transfer-overview-target-: Column header for the target page last change date
bs-translation-transfer-new-draft-transl:
Notification label when a new draft translation exists.

Parameter:
* $1 = link to check the draft
bs-translation-transfer-banner-dismiss: Button label to dismiss a translation banner
bs-translation-transfer-translation-exis: Error shown when a translation already exists and is linked to a different page
bs-translation-transfer-config-namespace: Label for config variable on [[Special:BlueSpiceConfigManager]] defining namespace mapping
Help text for namespace mapping configuration
bs-translation-transfer-ui-source-namesp: Field label for source namespace in the namespace mapping configuration form
bs-translation-transfer-ui-target-namesp: Field label for target namespace in the namespace mapping configuration form
bs-translation-transfer-ui-target-lang: Field label for target language in the namespace mapping configuration form
bs-translation-transfer-ui-add: Button label to add a new entry in the namespace mapping configuration form
bs-translation-transfer-ui-add-namespace: Section label for adding a new namespace mapping
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-desc: Description text for the translation dictionary page
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-filte: Label for the dictionary filter input
Placeholder text for filtering by main or translation language
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-switc: Dropdown option label to switch to the main language in dictionary view
Dropdown option label to select a language in dictionary view
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-actio: Action button label to edit a dictionary entry
Action button label to remove a dictionary entry
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-edit-: Title of the dictionary edit dialog
Button label to save changes in the dictionary edit dialog
Button label to cancel dictionary edit dialog
Button label to go back in dictionary edit dialog
Warning message about the effects of editing a translation in the dictionary

Warning in dictionary edit dialog listing affected pages.

Parameters:
* $1 = number of pages
* $2 = link to list of pages. Uses {{PLURAL:$1}}.

Label showing the current translation being changed.

Parameter:
* $1 = original translation

Confirmation question when changing a translation.

Parameters:
* $1 = old translation
* $2 = new translation
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-trans: Error shown when the suggested dictionary translation already exists in the same namespace
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-remov: Title of the dictionary remove confirmation dialog
Button label to confirm removing a dictionary entry
Button label to cancel removing a dictionary entry

Confirmation message asking if the translation should be removed.

Parameter:
* $1 = translation text
bs-translation-transfer-ui-dialog-target: Label for the input field to set the target page name in the transfer dialog
bs-translation-transfer-ui-dialog-title-: Title of the translation preview dialog
bs-translation-transfer-glossary-action-: Action button label to edit a glossary entry
Action button label to remove a glossary entry
bs-translation-transfer-glossary-source-: Placeholder text in glossary form for entering the source text
bs-translation-transfer-glossary-transla: Placeholder text in glossary form for entering the text of the translation
bs-translation-transfer-glossary-edit-di: Title of the glossary edit dialog
Button label to save glossary changes
Button label to cancel glossary edit dialog

Label showing the glossary translation being changed.

Parameter:
* $1 = original translation
bs-translation-transfer-special-page-not: Warning shown on BlueSpiceTranslationTransfer special page when configuration is missing
bs-translation-transfer-glossary-sync-er: Error message shown when glossary synchronisation fails
bs-translation-transfer-config-column-ta: Column header for target language in configuration tables
Column header for target namespace in configuration tables
bs-translation-transfer-config-column-de: Column header for delete action in configuration tables
bs-translation-transfer-config-namespace: Label for config variable to enable namespaces for translation
Help message for the config variable to enable namespaces for translation
